title: DSML Kazakhstan
subtitle: DSMLKZ Community - AI and Machine Learning enthusiasts community in Kazakhstan
communityDescription: Connect with over 10,000 AI and ML enthusiasts across Kazakhstan through our diverse platforms. From technical discussions to career opportunities, we've built a comprehensive ecosystem for data science professionals.
discussionHubDescription: Main community chat for technical discussions, Q&A, and networking with fellow data scientists and ML engineers.
newsFeedDescription: Stay updated with the latest AI/ML news, research papers, conference announcements, and community updates.
dataJobsDescription: Exclusive job opportunities in data science, machine learning, and AI roles across Kazakhstan and internationally.
itJobsDescription: Broader IT job opportunities including software development, DevOps, and technical leadership positions.
youtubeChannelDescription: Educational content, conference recordings, interviews with industry experts, and technical tutorials.
linkedinPageDescription: Professional networking, industry insights, and career development content for AI/ML professionals.
collaborationSubtitle: We partner with leading companies and organizations to create value for our community members.

mediaSupport.title: Media Partnership
mediaSupport.details: Reach our 10,000+ community members through our channels. We provide media support for conferences, workshops, and industry events.

hiring.title: Talent Acquisition
hiring.details: Access our pool of skilled data scientists, ML engineers, and AI researchers. We help companies find the right talent for their projects.

corporateTraining.title: Corporate Training
corporateTraining.details: Custom training programs designed for corporate teams. From basic data science to advanced machine learning implementations.

consulting.title: Technical Consulting
consulting.details: Our community experts provide consulting services for AI/ML strategy, implementation, and optimization projects.

communityFirstDesc: We prioritize the needs and growth of our community members above all else.
continuousLearningDesc: We foster an environment of constant learning and knowledge sharing.
careerGrowthDesc: We help our members advance their careers through networking and opportunities.

newsFeed.title: News Feed
newsFeed.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest in Data Science and Machine Learning
newsFeed.highlightsDesc: Key updates and trending topics in the DSML community

cta.title: Ready to Join the Future of AI in Central Asia?
cta.description: Connect with like-minded professionals, access exclusive resources, and accelerate your career in AI/ML.
